comment: She's a very nice person, and gives a lot of feedback every class. Usually 1 art piece due every week on Fridays.

This class is generally easy however she may not be the most suitable prof if you are not art inclined. Her feedback is only in person not posted on d2l, additionally she is caring but may be difficult to understand at times. Additionally, you can leave class early as long you do your work. Midterm and final is easy as well.

She has a unique accent and makes it hard to understand her. She grades things 1-5 so if she doesn't like a part of your design it automatically drops to an 80% minimum. There are two: two part test, 10 multiple choice and a art piece. Its an easy class but hard to know what she wants. You can literally walk out and she wont care.

she was such a sweet professor. she truly cares about you success in the class and provides valuable feedback that helps with future assignments. all of her assignments have clear instruction. she will give positive criticism and help you feel safe in the environment.
Take her if you want an A. Go to class and she guides you through all the projects. Very easy and very sweet. You do have to buy your own materials though so be aware of that.

Sweet lady, but for someone who is not naturally art-inclined she doesn't know how to teach. She facilitates, but doesn't provide good instruction. She only gives verbal instruction, if you misunderstand what she said the first time good luck. I try to ask questions too but she doesn't understand because her English skills aren't great.

She's such a nice lady, helps you through each assignment almost holding your hand. Her class is creativity-heavy and relies on your ability to follow the prompt of the assignment. I see people saying shes a tough grader, she mainly just grades on a five-point scale. You don't need to be an amazing artist to pass though. Love her lots.

If you are not an art student/talented artist, I do not recommend taking her class. She grades out of 5 points therefore, if you get a 4/5 you get an 80 on your work. And even worse if you miss two points, you are automatically dropped to a 60%. I struggle in this class due to her harsh grading and its hard to communicate with her.

Im taking this class over the summer, Im not sure if shes decreasing the work load since its summer or if she just assigns very little work to start with. Either way this class has been a breeze and she's so nice! She'll let us leave class early sometimes. And like everyone else is saying, her accent is pretty thick.

dr. hussein is amazing! shes very sweet and gives cool projects. ask her for feedback and she will work with you and tell you how to improve. my only complaint is she has two tests over art terms and if you don't study you wont do well. however your grade is balanced by 2 sketchbook portfolios, which you have all semester to work on. love her!

Professor Hussein is wonderful! She gives great feedback and critique of your work, and always tries to help you improve. She has a really good eye! Her assignments are interesting and fun as well. I would definitely take her again!

I love professor Hussein! She is so sweet and cares about everyone's work and efforts. She is always positive and gives good feedback to help with your projects, you can tell she truly wants the best for you. The assignments are pretty easy and she does not give any homework, she prefers you only work in class for direction. She is amazing.

Shes sweet but sometimes difficult to understand what she wants per project. only had around 10 projects/exercises to do over the entire semester and we had a week or more to do each of them during class. As long as you finish the projects eventually, youll probably still get an A in her course.

Very sweet. This class was very easy, but it was my fault that I didnt so well in the end. There are only four assignments in the class. Two portfolios and two tests. She doesnt grade hard on the portfolios but she does grade on accuracy not completion. So make sure you are neat. Also the tests are mainly memorization so study and youll pass.

Professor Hussein is the best professor I've had at Kennesaw. She is extremely nice and understanding. I could have received a higher grade if I hadn't missed an assignment, completely my fault. Her class is graded on 4 total grades: portfolio 1, midterm, portfolio 2, and final. So make sure you do all work for portfolios! She's awesome!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Besides me not understanding her at some times, she is great. She gives you well enough time for your assignments and is clear on what she wants your assignments to look like. I received a C because I was slacking in this class, my fault not hers, but you can easily get a B+. She grades your assignments on how well she deems you used the teachings
rating_tags: Caring--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr Hussein is an absolute gem! she is the sweetest professor ive ever had. even when someone is absent, she will go ask their friend to check up on them. she is a very talented artist and grades you based on improvement not skill.

Dr. Mona is a very kind woman, but hard to understand much of the time. She has a heavy accent but if you can work through much miscommunication then she's a good choice. You only get 4 grades: midterm, 2 portfolios and final, so do your work! She is the type to draw on your paper for you so don't take her if that bothers you.

In my opinion, Mona Hussein is an amazing Professor. She is kind, helpful and knows a lot about art. She also gives great leeway on assignments and makes sure youll get them done. Her accent is very strong, so its hard to understand her sometimes. Be sure to ask for clarification and always do the assignments. Take her for drawing and 2D design!

I am so glad I got to take her class for 2d Design and Color Theory! She's a very passionate teacher who is respectful and kind. She is bilingual and a bit difficult to understand at times; however, this doesn't stunt how much fun this class is. It's a simple intro to design & color theory, which was an easy A and tons of fun! I highly recommend!
Makes you love what you do
great teacher!
Very Helpful Informative
